com.google.inject.tools.suite.module
Interface ModuleManager

public interface ModuleManager

Responsible for tracking the modules which should be run when resolving bindings and injections. Users should call updateModules() periodically and then getActiveModuleContexts() and use the resulting objects to find information about guice modules.

Author:
Darren Creutz (dcreutz@gmail.com)

Nested Class Summary
static interface ModuleManager.PostUpdater
          A piece of code to run after an update has completed.
